title: Immersive AR/VR-Based Program to Enhance Perceived Employability of Vocational High School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic vocational literacy and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Students engage in job simulations using AR/VR content via personal devices, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Students can enhance their job performance skills by experiencing three or more job-related scenarios in an AR/VR environment.
Learners can analyze the impact of immersive technologies on perceived employability through surveys based on the UTAUT2 model.
Participants can identify over 80% of the core competencies required in the actual job market based on virtual experiences.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
